member.summary: Used to define the scope in which instances activated via a binding should be re-used.

member.name: M:Ninject.Web.Mvc.FilterBindingSyntax.IFilterBindingInSyntax`1.InSingletonScope
member.summary: Indicates that only a single instance of the binding should be created, and then should be re-used for all subsequent requests.

member.name: M:Ninject.Web.Mvc.FilterBindingSyntax.IFilterBindingInSyntax`1.InTransientScope
